xwikidoc.content: activitypub.follow.input.label=Follow the given user activitypub.follow.input.hint=Enter the identifier of an user to start following him/her activitypub.follow.input.placeholder=@foo@domain activitypub.follow.button=Follow activitypub.follow.followRequested=The follow request has been sent. activitypub.follow.followNotRequested=The follow request failed. activitypub.follow.followYourself=You can't follow yourself. activitypub.follow.alreadyFollowed=You already follow this user. activitypub.follow.target.placeholder=Insert here the identifier(s) of user(s) activitypub.message.target.label=Target users of the message activitypub.message.target.hint=You can select your followers and/or some specif users. activitypub.message.target.placeholder=Insert here the identifier(s) of user(s) activitypub.message.content.label=Content of your message activitypub.message.content.hint=Type here the message you want to send activitypub.message.button=Send the message activitypub.following.title=Following activitypub.following.empty=This user is not following anyone. activitypub.followers.title=Followers activitypub.followers.empty=This user does not have any follower yet. activitypub.user.profile.menu=ActivityPub activitypub.webfinger=Webfinger activitypub.follow.actornotfound=The user you specified cannot be found. activitypub.storage.needrestart=The ActivityPub storage is not ready. Please ask the administrator to restart the server to initialize it. activitypub.webfinger.notconfigured=The WebFinger endpoint is not configured on this server. You might want to ask your administrator to configure it in order to help using ActivityPub. activitypub.user.identifier=ActivityPub user identifier activitypub.user.identifier.tip=Use this identifier if you want to interact with this user. activitypub.user.identifier.copyButton=Copy the ActivityPub user identifier activitypub.user.identifier.copied=The identifier has been copied into your clipboard. activitypub.message.messageSent=Message sent. activitypub.message.messageError=Error when sending the message. activitypub.shareDocument.success=Page shared successfully activitypub.shareDocument.failure=Page share failed activitypub.shareDocument.modalTitle=Document Share activitypub.shareDocument.target.label=Target users of the document sharing activitypub.shareDocument.target.hint=You can select your followers and/or some specif users. activitypub.shareDocument.target.placeholder=Insert here the identifier(s) of user(s) activitypub.shareDocument.publicRecipientWarning=Be aware that pages shared without "public" being part of the recipients can be ignored by some instances of the fediverse. activitypub.dashboard.tab.follow=Follow activitypub.dashboard.tab.message=New message activitypub.dashboard.guest=You cannot use this application as guest user, please log in. ActivityPub.ActivityPubConfigurationClass_pageNotifications.hint=Whether page creation and modification notifications are active or not. ActivityPub.ActivityPubConfigurationClass_pageNotificationPolicy.hint=Page creation and modifications notifications are send to the followers of the selected users. activitypub.dashboard.tab.sentMessagesList=Sent messages activitypub.dashboard.tab.receivedMessagesList=Received messages activitypub.dashboard.noactor=You can only access this macro if an actor is defined. activitypub.dashboard.title=Dashboard of {0} activitypub.message.display.from=From: activitypub.message.display.to=To: activitypub.message.display.date=Date: activitypub.message.display.content=Content: activitypub.message.nomessage=There is currently no message to display. activitypub.message.display.public=Public message
